SageTVPlugin.Name: Automatic Power Off
SageTVPlugin.Description: Allows to automatically power off a SageTV Media Extender (MVP/HDx00) after a configurable playback/inactivity timeout and to optionally executing a user batch/script every time all clients are connecting and/or disconnecting from the SageTV server.
SageTVPlugin.Author: routerunner
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes: 1.0.0 - First Public Release 1.0.1 - Fix plugin didn't start properly sometimes 1.0.2 - Added connect/disconnect batch/script (all clients supported). 1.0.3 - Added the ability to enable the automatic power off flag for each extender separately. 1.0.4 - Fix compatibility issue with earlier Java versions. 1.0.5 - Fix play list issue. 1.0.6 - Fix failure of powering off after inactivity timeout. Implemented powering off after playback timeout. 1.0.7 - No changes. Plugin moved to a different repository.
